prop_obj.text: The  syllabus is designed to assess the candidates’ basic knowledge of store management, customer’s
satisfaction and the understanding of entrepreneurial skill in managing a small or big store.

The examination therefore intends to test candidates’:
(i)       understanding of the rudiments of running a store and entrepreneurial skill.
(ii) understanding of the concepts of wholesaling and retailing, basic business  documents and how to
(iii) ability to relate concepts learnt to control stock, keep records and manage business risk.
